item.title: Furiousball add a quote by Viktor E. Frankl
item.description: "Ultimately, man should not ask what the meaning of his life is, but rather must recognize that it is he who is asked. In a word, each man is questioned by life; and he can only answer to life by answering for his own life; to life he can only respond by being responsible." -- Viktor E. Frankl

item.title: Furiousball add a quote by Viktor E. Frankl
item.description: "The one thing you can’t take away from me is the way I choose to respond to what you do to me. The last of one’s freedoms is to choose one’s attitude in any given circumstance." -- Viktor E. Frankl

item.title: Furiousball add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "He who has a why to live for can bear almost any how." -- Friedrich Nietzsche
